name: Phone&Home Privacy
description: Phone&Home Privacy  Privacy - The permissions of your apps are listed in a list. Similarly, your apps will be divided into three categories according to their permissions. This gives you an overview of which apps threaten your privacy.  Camera and microphone blocking blocks intruders from outside. You can decide which apps have access to your camera and microphone.  Parental Control / App Protection - You have the option to secure apps with a PIN or a pattern. Only authorized persons get access to these apps.   Phone&Home Privacy Functions:  Privacy - Categorization of existing apps according to their permissions.  Authorization control - Overview of the number of installed apps and their authorizations.  Camera blocking - Blocks the camera without your permission. You determine which apps have access to your camera.  Microphone Block - Blocks the microphone without your permission. You specify which apps have access to your microphone.  Parental Lock / App Protection - Block certain apps with a PIN or pattern to prevent unauthorized access.   This app uses the Device Administrator permission.
